wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We are an organic burgers & fries restaurant located in Brooklyn, New York, USA. We’ve won a ton of awards and have been featured in all of the burgers & fries magazines.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Every member of Bklyn Social enjoys the fun of staying up-to-date with events at Bklyn's and will have access to exclusive Bklyn's offers from time to time.

item.title: Our Famous Menu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [ut_menu id="3060"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Choose as many of our free toppings as you want! Mayo, Lettuce, Pickles, Tomatoes, Grilled Onions, Grilled Mushrooms, Ketchup, Mustard, Relish, Onions, Jalapeno Peppers, Green Peppers, Bklyn Burger Souce, Bklyn-B-Q Souce, Bklyn-Hot Souce, American Cheddar

item.title: Extremely Satisfied Customers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_single_quote author="John Bison" company="" title="Best Burger in Town" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo15/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="false" effect="fadeIn"] A great meal at a good price. We sat outside and enjoyed the food and friendly staff. Enjoy a wide selection of food and drink. Highly recommend! [/ut_single_quote]
[ut_single_quote author="Will Clark" company="" title="Flawless Burger" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo15/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="true" effect="fadeIn"] I always get the Bklyn Special Burger here and it is always amazing. [/ut_single_quote]
[ut_single_quote author="Elton Martin" company="" title="Awesome Burger and Location" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo15/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="false" effect="fadeIn"] Very good food especially after a long morning flight into Brooklyn. We had to kill a little time for our hotel room to get ready. I'd eat here again. [/ut_single_quote]
[ut_single_quote author="Roger Wilson" company="" title="Still No.1" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo15/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="true" effect="fadeIn"] My family likes Bklyn Guys so much that we are regulars. Not cheap food and that's the point. Good quality meat and food everyone likes. [/ut_single_quote]

item.title: 8 Hours in Brooklyn
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
http://vimeo.com/27260633
All footage was shot within an 8 hour span in Brooklyn, NYC. This piece serves as a visual case study on several aspects of daily life in the borough of Brooklyn.
Shot on Rule Boston Camera’s Phantom Flex camera.
Director/Cinematographer: Jonathan Bregel Color Grade: Khalid Mohtaseb Production NGAFers: Dan Selby, Jesse Korman, Chris Dowsett Executive Producer: James Douglas Production Company: Variable
Song used: Skream – “Where you should be”

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/27260633" width="1170" height="658" frameborder="0" title="8 Hours in Brooklyn" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
